abstract: Anna Fermanova is sentenced in Manhattan to four months in prison for trying to smuggle night-vision weapon scopes to Russia, following guilty plea.
snippet: Anna Fermanova was sentenced to four months in prison for trying to smuggle night-vision weapon scopes to Russia.
lead_paragraph: Anna Fermanova was sentenced to four months in prison for trying to smuggle night-vision weapon scopes to Russia.

headline.main: Woman Sentenced in Effort to Smuggle Scopes to Russia
headline.print_headline: Woman Sentenced in Effort To Smuggle Scopes to Russia
headline.seo: Anna Fermanova Sentenced for Trying to Smuggle Weapon Scopes to Russia
